QuestData.Title: Welcome to the Brotherhood
QuestData.Description: You should return to Thorium Point. Overseer Oilfist and the rest of the Thorium Brotherhood will be wondering how you fared in the fight against Calcinder.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Overseer Oilfist at Thorium Point in Searing Gorge.
QuestData.RewardText: Our task is complete, and it's all thanks to you, $n. I'd like to offer you your choice from our coffers. In addition, I intend to make you a full-fledged member of our order.$b$bWelcome to the Thorium Brotherhood, $n. I'm proud to call you a $g brother: sister;.
